ygData.subject: RE: Rathe Mountains
ygData.msgSnippet: Has anyone else noticed this strange warping problem lately?  I had never experienced it before, but it seems since the last patch, things have been warping
ygData.messageBody:
Has anyone else noticed this strange warping problem lately? I had never
experienced it before, but it seems since the last patch, things have been
"warping" out of range all the time. I've noticed this in the Karanas,
Oasis, and even in Solusek B last night. New bug?


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 48 Bard
Erollisi Marr


<snip>
- The pathing and warping in the zone is VERY bad. You'll be fighting a
giant and suddenly
it's just GONE. Sometimes it warps just a short distance, which is no big
deal,
he'll come running after you quickly enough. The real danger is when they
warp a long
distance away, and then never come back. Never, that is, until you happen
to walk
near him later, and he comes running with his 4 giant friends and the
little cyclops
who wants to be part of the group.
